mapper.insert: insert into userModel( uid , displayname , email , banner_id , phoneNumber , photoUrl , providerId , token_google ) values( #{uid} , #{displayname} , #{email} , #{banner_id} , #{phoneNumber} , #{photoUrl} , #{providerId} , #{token_google})
insert into main_banner_item ( ad_id, banner_id, img_url, item_Click_url ) values( #{ad_id} , #{banner_id} , #{img_url} , #{item_Click_url} )

insert into shops ( shop_id , add_info_as_phone , add_info_ceo , add_info_change_pay , add_info_email , add_info_internet_confirm_number , add_info_tran_auto_type , add_info_tran_customer_code , add_info_tran_name , add_info_trans_add_number , add_info_trans_recall_add , add_info_working_time , basic_age_type , basic_style , basic_title_word , shop_count_item_click , shop_count_like , shop_homepage , shop_main_img , shop_name )
values( #{shop_id}, #{add_info_as_phone}, #{add_info_ceo}, #{add_info_change_pay}, #{add_info_email}, #{add_info_internet_confirm_number}, #{add_info_tran_auto_type}, #{add_info_tran_customer_code}, #{add_info_tran_name}, #{add_info_trans_add_number}, #{add_info_trans_recall_add}, #{add_info_working_time}, #{basic_age_type}, #{basic_style}, #{basic_title_word}, #{shop_count_item_click}, #{shop_count_like}, #{shop_homepage}, #{shop_main_img}, #{shop_name} )

insert into item ( shop_id, shop_item_detail_url, shop_item_name, shop_item_price_original, shop_item_price_sale, shop_item_url, shop_title, item_id ) values( #{shop_id} , #{shop_item_detail_url} , #{shop_item_name} , #{shop_item_price_original} , #{shop_item_price_sale} , #{shop_item_url} , #{shop_title} , #{item_id} )

insert into shop_item_detail_array ( item_id , detail_item_categori , detail_item_color , detail_item_img , detail_item_img_thum , detail_item_shop_fee , detail_item_size , detail_item_title , detail_pages_item , shop_item_detail_url , shop_item_name , shop_item_price_original , shop_item_price_sale , shop_item_url ) values( #{item_id} , #{detail_item_categori} , #{detail_item_color} , #{detail_item_img} , #{detail_item_img_thum} , #{detail_item_shop_fee} , #{detail_item_size} , #{detail_item_title} , #{detail_pages_item} , #{shop_item_detail_url} , #{shop_item_name} , #{shop_item_price_original} , #{shop_item_price_sale} , #{shop_item_url} )

insert into event ( event_id , click_count , end_date , event_content , img_url_content , img_url_main , start_date ) values( #{event_id}, #{click_count}, #{end_date}, #{event_content}, #{img_url_content}, #{img_url_main}, #{start_date} )
